overview:
As Vice President of the Branded Entertainment Group, Audie oversees a variety of projects within the branded entertainment division of EQAL, including the Effie Award-winning campaign Real Women of Philadelphia, a digital partnership between Paula Deen and Kraft Foods.

A native of Connecticut and born into a family of musicians, Audie Metcalf studied voice at Berklee College of Music and holds a B.A. in Literature from Bard College. She has written about food and entertainment for a variety of magazines, websites and cookbooks, and has worked with David Rosengarten, Susan Lucci, Charles Durning, and Daniel Tosh, among others.

Having lived in the UK and New York City, Audie is thrilled to call Los Angeles her home. When not working, her interests include seamlessly incorporating giant pork chops into her newly adapted vegan lifestyle.
